reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 77/97: JOINT INVESTMENTS - DESIGNATION OF ADDITIONAL PERSONS UNDER SUBSECTION 420 (1) OF THE ACT
reg_info.reg_name_text: Joint Investments — designation of additional persons under subsection 420 (1) of the act
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 77/97: JOINT INVESTMENTS - DESIGNATION OF ADDITIONAL PERSONS UNDER SUBSECTION 420 (1) OF THE ACT
reg_info.act_under: Municipal Act, 2001   Loi de 2001 sur les municipalités

content.content: 1. The following are prescribed, for the purposes of subsection 420 (1) of the Act, as persons with whom a municipality may enter into joint investment agreements: 1. A local board as defined in section 1 of the Municipal Affairs Act other than a school board. 1.1 A foundation established by a college established under the Ontario Colleges of Applied Arts and Technology Act, 2002 whose purposes include receiving and maintaining a fund or funds for the benefit of the college. 2. An agent of a local board described in paragraph 1 or 1.1.  O. Reg. 77/97, s. 1; O. Reg. 388/02, s. 2; O. Reg. 285/09, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. The following are prescribed, for the purposes of subsection 420 (1) of the Act, as persons with whom a municipality may enter into joint investment agreements:

1. A local board as defined in section 1 of the Municipal Affairs Act other than a school board.

1.1 A foundation established by a college established under the Ontario Colleges of Applied Arts and Technology Act, 2002 whose purposes include receiving and maintaining a fund or funds for the benefit of the college.

2. An agent of a local board described in paragraph 1 or 1.1.  O. Reg. 77/97, s. 1; O. Reg. 388/02, s. 2; O. Reg. 285/09, s. 1.
